III.i.2.F.4.b
.
Claim-Level Suspense
The claim-level suspense reason and date will automatically update based on tracked items when a claim is in
Open
status.
Each tracked item will automatically map to a claim-level suspense reason.
When the claim status is a status other than
Open
, and a tracked item is added or reopened, the system will automatically set the claim status to
Open
and update the claim-level suspense reason and date based on the opened tracked item(s).
The claim-level suspense reason and date will be updated by the claim status when the claim status is anything other than
Open
.
